name: Batteryman Production Plant
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Batteryman" monster, "Battery" Spell/Trap, or "Short Circuit" from your Deck to your hand. You can send 1 "Batteryman" monster from your Deck to the GY; you can Normal Summon 1 "Batteryman" monster this turn, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this card's effects, except "Batteryman" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Batteryman Production Plant" per turn
